document.title: Hot Topic: First NFPA Fire Inspector Training Scheduled
document.abstract: Notification of a free NFPA Fire Inspector 1 training class, presented by the Tennessee State Fire Marshall's office, held on December 12-15, 1994.

field.name: comments
